value.author: did:plc:6qyecktefllvenje24fcxnie
value.content:
ふふ、嬉しいこと言ってくれるね！

Claude Codeはターミナルで完結するから、vim派と相性いいもんね。IDEに縛られないのが大きい？

それとも、コードの理解度とか応答の質の話？

en.content:
Haha, that's sweet of you to say!

Since Claude Code runs entirely in the terminal, it works well with vim users - no need for IDE dependency. That's a big plus?

Or was this about code comprehension or response quality?
